00036     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00037     const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00038     const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00039     const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00040     XSecondaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00041         m_entryPeakAbs(create<XScalarEntry>("PeakAbs", false,
00042             dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00043         m_entryPeakFreq(create<XScalarEntry>("PeakFreq", false,
00044             dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))), 
00045         m_dso(create<XItemNode<XDriverList, XDSO> >("DSO", false, drivers, true)),

00047         m_width(create<XDoubleNode>("Width", false)),
00048         m_phaseAdv(create<XDoubleNode>("PhaseAdv", false)),
00049         m_useDNR(create<XBoolNode>("UseDNR", false)),
00050         m_solverList(create<XComboNode>("SpectrumSolver", false, true)),
00051         m_bgPos(create<XDoubleNode>("BGPos", false)),
00052         m_bgWidth(create<XDoubleNode>("BGWidth", false)),
00053         m_fftPos(create<XDoubleNode>("FFTPos", false)),
00054         m_fftLen(create<XUIntNode>("FFTLen", false)),
00055         m_windowFunc(create<XComboNode>("WindowFunc", false, true)),
00056         m_windowWidth(create<XDoubleNode>("WindowLength", false)),
00057         m_difFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("DIFFreq", false)),
00058         m_exAvgIncr(create<XBoolNode>("ExAvgIncr", false)),
00059         m_extraAvg(create<XUIntNode>("ExtraAvg", false)),
00060         m_numEcho(create<XUIntNode>("NumEcho", false)),
00061         m_echoPeriod(create<XDoubleNode>("EchoPeriod", false)),
00062         m_spectrumShow(create<XNode>("SpectrumShow", true)),
00063         m_avgClear(create<XNode>("AvgClear", true)),
00064         m_picEnabled(create<XBoolNode>("PICEnabled", false)),
00065         m_pulser(create<XItemNode<XDriverList, XPulser> >("Pulser", false, drivers, true)),
00066         m_form(new FrmNMRPulse(g_pFrmMain)),
00067         m_statusPrinter(XStatusPrinter::create(m_form.get())),
00068         m_spectrumForm(new FrmGraphNURL(g_pFrmMain)), m_waveGraph(create<XWaveNGraph>("Wave", true,
00069             m_form->m_graph, m_form->m_urlDump, m_form->m_btnDump)),
00070         m_ftWaveGraph(create<XWaveNGraph>("Spectrum", true, m_spectrumForm.get())),
00071         m_solver(create<SpectrumSolverWrapper>("SpectrumSolver", true, m_solverList, m_windowFunc, m_windowWidth)),
00072         m_solverDNR(new FreqEstLeastSquare(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL)) {
00073     m_form->m_btnAvgClear->setIconSet(KApplication::kApplication()->iconLoader()->loadIconSet("editdelete", KIcon::Toolbar, KIcon::SizeSmall, true) );
00074     m_form->m_btnSpectrum->setIconSet(KApplication::kApplication()->iconLoader()->loadIconSet("graph", KIcon::Toolbar, KIcon::SizeSmall, true) );
00075 
00076     connect(dso());
00077     connect(pulser(), false);
00078 
00079     scalarentries->insert(entryPeakAbs());
00080     scalarentries->insert(entryPeakFreq());
00081 
00082     fromTrig()->value(-0.005);
00083     width()->value(0.02);
00084     bgPos()->value(0.03);
00085     bgWidth()->value(0.03);
00086     fftPos()->value(0.004);
00087     fftLen()->value(16384);
00088     numEcho()->value(1);
00089     windowFunc()->str(std::string(SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_DEFAULT));
00090     windowWidth()->value(100.0);
00091

00093

00095

00097         m_form->m_btnAvgClear);
00098     m_conSpectrumShow = xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_spectrumShow, m_form->m_btnSpectrum);
00099 
00100     m_conFromTrig = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(fromTrig(),
00101         m_form->m_edPos);
00102     m_conWidth = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(width(), m_form->m_edWidth);
00103     m_form->m_numPhaseAdv->setRange(-180.0, 180.0, 1.0, true);
00104     m_conPhaseAdv = xqcon_create<XKDoubleNumInputConnector>(phaseAdv(),
00105         m_form->m_numPhaseAdv);
00106     m_conUseDNR = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(useDNR(),
00107         m_form->m_ckbDNR);
00108     m_conSolverList = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(solverList(),
00109         m_form->m_cmbSolver);
00110     m_conBGPos = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(bgPos(), m_form->m_edBGPos);
00111     m_conBGWidth = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(bgWidth(),
00112         m_form->m_edBGWidth);
00113     m_conFFTPos = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(fftPos(),
00114         m_form->m_edFFTPos);
00115     m_conFFTLen = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(fftLen(),
00116         m_form->m_edFFTLen);
00117     m_form->m_numExtraAvg->setRange(0, 100000);
00118     m_conExtraAv = xqcon_create<XQSpinBoxConnector>(extraAvg(),
00119         m_form->m_numExtraAvg);
00120     m_conExAvgIncr = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(exAvgIncr(),
00121         m_form->m_ckbIncrAvg);
00122     m_conNumEcho = xqcon_create<XQSpinBoxConnector>(numEcho(),
00123         m_form->m_numEcho);
00124     m_conEchoPeriod = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(echoPeriod(),
00125         m_form->m_edEchoPeriod);
00126     m_conWindowFunc = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(windowFunc(),
00127         m_form->m_cmbWindowFunc);
00128     m_form->m_numWindowWidth->setRange(3.0, 200.0, 1.0, true);
00129     m_conWindowWidth = xqcon_create<XKDoubleNumInputConnector>(windowWidth(),
00130         m_form->m_numWindowWidth);
00131     m_conDIFFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(difFreq(),
00132         m_form->m_edDIFFreq);
00133 
00134     m_conPICEnabled = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_picEnabled,
00135         m_form->m_ckbPICEnabled);
00136 
00137     m_conPulser = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_pulser,
00138         m_form->m_cmbPulser);
00139     m_conDSO = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(dso(), m_form->m_cmbDSO);
00140 
00141     {
00142         const char *labels[] = { "Time [ms]", "IFFT Re [V]", "IFFT Im [V]", "DSO CH1[V]", "DSO CH2[V]"};
00143         waveGraph()->setColCount(5, labels);
00144         waveGraph()->insertPlot(labels[1], 0, 1);
00145         waveGraph()->insertPlot(labels[2], 0, 2);
00146         waveGraph()->insertPlot(labels[3], 0, 3);
00147         waveGraph()->insertPlot(labels[4], 0, 4);
00148         waveGraph()->axisy()->label()->value(KAME::i18n("Intens. [V]"));
00149         waveGraph()->plot(0)->label()->value(KAME::i18n("IFFT Re."));
00150         waveGraph()->plot(0)->drawPoints()->value(false);

00155         waveGraph()->plot(2)->label()->value(KAME::i18n("DSO CH1"));
00156         waveGraph()->plot(2)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00157         waveGraph()->plot(2)->lineColor()->value(QColor(0xff, 0xa0, 0x00).rgb());
00158         waveGraph()->plot(2)->intensity()->value(0.6);

00160         waveGraph()->plot(3)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00161         waveGraph()->plot(3)->lineColor()->value(QColor(0x00, 0xa0, 0xff).rgb());
00162         waveGraph()->plot(3)->intensity()->value(0.6);
00163         waveGraph()->clear();
00164     }
00165     {
00166         const char *labels[] = { "Freq. [kHz]", "Re. [V]", "Im. [V]",
00167             "Abs. [V]", "Phase [deg]" };
00168         ftWaveGraph()->setColCount(5, labels);
00169         ftWaveGraph()->insertPlot(labels[3], 0, 3);
00170         ftWaveGraph()->insertPlot(labels[4], 0, -1, 4);
00171         ftWaveGraph()->plot(0)->label()->value(KAME::i18n("abs."));
00172         ftWaveGraph()->plot(0)->drawBars()->value(true);
00173         ftWaveGraph()->plot(0)->drawLines()->value(true);
00174         ftWaveGraph()->plot(0)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00175         ftWaveGraph()->plot(0)->intensity()->value(0.5);
00176         ftWaveGraph()->plot(1)->label()->value(KAME::i18n("phase"));
00177         ftWaveGraph()->plot(1)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00178         ftWaveGraph()->clear();
00179         {
00180             shared_ptr<XXYPlot> plot = ftWaveGraph()->graph()->plots()->create<XXYPlot>(
00181                 "Peaks", true, ftWaveGraph()->graph());
00182             m_peakPlot = plot;
00183             plot->label()->value(KAME::i18n("Peaks"));
00184             plot->axisX()->value(ftWaveGraph()->axisx());
00185             plot->axisY()->value(ftWaveGraph()->axisy());
00186             plot->drawPoints()->value(false);

00190             plot->displayMajorGrid()->value(false);
00191             plot->pointColor()->value(QColor(0x40, 0x40, 0xa0).rgb());
00192             plot->barColor()->value(QColor(0x40, 0x40, 0xa0).rgb());
00193             plot->clearPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00194             plot->maxCount()->setUIEnabled(false);
00195         }
00196     }
00197 
00198     m_lsnOnAvgClear = m_avgClear->onTouch().connectWeak(shared_from_this(), &XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onAvgClear);
00199     m_lsnOnSpectrumShow = m_spectrumShow->onTouch().connectWeak(shared_from_this(), &XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onSpectrumShow,
00200         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP);
00201 
00202     m_lsnOnCondChanged = fromTrig()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(shared_from_this(), &XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onCondChanged);
00203     width()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00204     phaseAdv()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00205     useDNR()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00206     solverList()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00207     bgPos()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00208     bgWidth()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00209     fftPos()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00210     fftLen()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00211     //  extraAvg()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);

00218 }

00229 
00230 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::backgroundSub(std::vector<std::complex<double> > &wave, 
00231     int pos, int length, int bgpos, int bglength) {
00232 
00233     if(bglength < length*2)
00234         m_statusPrinter->printWarning(KAME::i18n("Maybe, length for BG. sub. is too short."));
00235     
00236     std::complex<double> bg = 0;
00237     if (bglength) {
00238         double normalize = 0.0;
00239         for (int i = 0; i < bglength; i++) {
00240             double z = 1.0;
00241             if(!*useDNR())
00242                 z = FFT::windowFuncHamming( (double)i / bglength - 0.5);
00243             bg += z * wave[pos + i + bgpos];
00244             normalize += z;
00245         }
00246         bg /= normalize;
00247     }
00248 
00249     for (int i = 0; i < wave.size(); i++) {
00250         wave[i] -= bg;
00251     }
00252 
00253     if (bglength && *useDNR()) {
00254         int dnrlength = FFT::fitLength((bglength + bgpos) * 4);
00255         std::vector<std::complex<double> > memin(bglength), memout(dnrlength);
00256         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < bglength; i++) {
00257             memin[i] = wave[pos + i + bgpos];
00258         }
00259         try {
00260             m_solverDNR->exec(memin, memout, bgpos, 0.5e-2, &FFT::windowFuncRect, 1.0);
00261         }
00262         catch (XKameError &e) {
00263             throw XSkippedRecordError(e.msg(), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00264         }
00265         int imax = std::min((int)wave.size() - pos, (int)memout.size());
00266         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < imax; i++) {
00267             wave[i + pos] -= m_solverDNR->ifft()[i];
00268         }
00269     }
00270 }
00271 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::rotNFFT(int ftpos, double ph,
00272     std::vector<std::complex<double> > &wave,
00273     std::vector<std::complex<double> > &ftwave) {
00274     int length = wave.size();
00275     //phase advance
00276     std::complex<double> cph(std::polar(1.0, ph));
00277     for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00278         wave[i] *= cph;
00279     }
00280 
00281     int fftlen = ftwave.size();
00282     //fft
00283     std::vector<std::complex<double> > fftout(fftlen);
00284     m_solverRecorded = m_solver->solver();
00285     try {
00286         m_solverRecorded->exec(wave, fftout, -ftpos, 0.3e-2, m_solver->windowFunc(), *windowWidth() / 100.0);
00287     }
00288     catch (XKameError &e) {
00289         throw XSkippedRecordError(e.msg(), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00290     }
00291 
00292     std::copy(fftout.begin(), fftout.end(), ftwave.begin());
00293 }
00294 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onAvgClear(const shared_ptr<XNode> &) {
00295     m_timeClearRequested = XTime::now();
00296     requestAnalysis();
00297 }
00298 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onCondChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node) {
00299     if ((node == numEcho()) || (node == difFreq()))
00300         m_timeClearRequested = XTime::now();
00301     if (node == exAvgIncr())
00302         m_timeClearRequested = XTime::now();
00303     if (node == exAvgIncr())
00304         extraAvg()->value(0);
00305     requestAnalysis();
00306 }
00307 bool XNMRPulseAnalyzer::checkDependency(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const {
00308     const shared_ptr<XPulser> _pulser = *pulser();
00309     if (emitter == _pulser)
00310         return false;
00311     const shared_ptr<XDSO> _dso = *dso();
00312     if (!_dso)
00313         return false;
00314     //    //Request for clear.
00315     //    if(m_timeClearRequested > _dso->timeAwared()) return true;
00316     //    if(_pulser && (_dso->timeAwared() < _pulser->time())) return false;
00317     return true;
00318 }
00319 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::analyze(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter)
00320     throw (XRecordError&) {
00321     const shared_ptr<XDSO> _dso = *dso();
00322     ASSERT(_dso);
00323     ASSERT(_dso->time() );
00324 
00325     if (_dso->numChannelsRecorded() < 1) {
00326         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("No record in DSO"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00327     }
00328     if (_dso->numChannelsRecorded() < 2) {
00329         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Two channels needed in DSO"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00330     }
00331 
00332     double interval = _dso->timeIntervalRecorded();
00333     if (interval <= 0) {
00334         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid time interval in waveforms."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00335     }
00336     int pos = lrint(*fromTrig() *1e-3 / interval + _dso->trigPosRecorded());
00337     double starttime = (pos - _dso->trigPosRecorded()) * interval;
00338     if (pos >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00339         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Position beyond waveforms."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00340     }
00341     if (pos < 0) {
00342         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Position beyond waveforms."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00343     }
00344     int length = lrint(*width() / 1000 / interval);
00345     if (pos + length >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00346         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid length."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00347     }
00348     if (length <= 0) {
00349         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid length."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00350     }
00351     
00352     int bgpos = lrint((*bgPos() - *fromTrig()) / 1000 / interval);
00353     if(pos + bgpos >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00354         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Position for BG. sub. beyond waveforms."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00355     }
00356     if(bgpos < 0) {
00357         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Position for BG. sub. beyond waveforms."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00358     }
00359     int bglength = lrint(*bgWidth() / 1000 / interval);
00360     if(pos + bgpos + bglength >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00361         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid Length for BG. sub."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00362     }
00363     if(bglength < 0) {
00364         throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid Length for BG. sub."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00365     }
00366     if((bgpos < length) && (bgpos + bglength > 0))
00367         m_statusPrinter->printWarning(KAME::i18n("Maybe, position for BG. sub. is overrapped against echoes"), true);
00368 
00369     int echoperiod = lrint(*echoPeriod() / 1000 /interval);
00370     int numechoes = *numEcho();
00371     bool bg_after_last_echo = (echoperiod < bgpos + bglength);
00372     if(numechoes > 1) {
00373         if(pos + echoperiod * (numechoes - 1) + length >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00374             throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid Multiecho settings."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00375         }
00376         if(echoperiod < length) {
00377             throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid Multiecho settings."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00378         }
00379         if(!bg_after_last_echo) {
00380             if(bgpos + bglength > echoperiod) {
00381                 throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid Multiecho settings."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00382             }
00383             if(pos + echoperiod * (numechoes - 1) + bgpos + bglength >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00384                 throw XSkippedRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid Multiecho settings."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00385             }
00386         }
00387     }
00388 
00389     if((m_startTime != starttime) || (length != m_waveWidth)) {
00390         double t = length * interval * 1e3;
00391         m_waveGraph->axisx()->autoScale()->value(false);
00392         m_waveGraph->axisx()->minValue()->value(starttime * 1e3 - t * 0.3);
00393         m_waveGraph->axisx()->maxValue()->value(starttime * 1e3 + t * 1.3);
00394     }
00395     m_waveWidth = length;
00396     bool skip = (m_timeClearRequested > _dso->timeAwared());
00397     bool avgclear = skip;
00398 
00399     if(interval != m_interval) {
00400         //[sec]
00401         m_interval = interval;
00402         avgclear = true;
00403     }
00404     if(m_startTime != starttime) {
00405         //[sec]
00406         m_startTime = starttime;
00407         avgclear = true;
00408     }
00409     
00410     if (length > (int)m_waveSum.size()) {
00411         avgclear = true;
00412     }
00413     m_wave.resize(length);
00414     m_waveSum.resize(length);
00415     std::fill(m_wave.begin(), m_wave.end(), 0.0);
00416 
00417     // Phase Inversion Cycling
00418     bool picenabled = *m_picEnabled;
00419     shared_ptr<XPulser> _pulser(*pulser());
00420     bool inverted = false;
00421     if (picenabled && (!_pulser || !_pulser->time())) {
00422         picenabled = false;
00423         gErrPrint(getLabel() + ": " + KAME::i18n("No active pulser!"));
00424     }
00425     if (picenabled) {
00426         inverted = _pulser->invertPhaseRecorded();
00427     }
00428 
00429     int avgnum = std::max((unsigned int)*extraAvg(), 1u) * (picenabled ? 2 : 1);
00430     
00431     if (!*exAvgIncr() && (avgnum <= m_avcount)) {
00432         avgclear = true;
00433     }
00434     if (avgclear) {
00435         std::fill(m_waveSum.begin(), m_waveSum.end(), 0.0);
00436         m_avcount = 0;
00437         if(*exAvgIncr()) {
00438             extraAvg()->value(0);
00439         }
00440     }
00441 
00442     if(skip) {
00443         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00444     }
00445 
00446     m_dsoWave.resize(_dso->lengthRecorded());
00447     {
00448         const double *rawwavecos, *rawwavesin = NULL;
00449         ASSERT( _dso->numChannelsRecorded() );
00450         rawwavecos = _dso->waveRecorded(0);
00451         rawwavesin = _dso->waveRecorded(1);
00452         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < _dso->lengthRecorded(); i++) {
00453             m_dsoWave[i] = std::complex<double>(rawwavecos[i], rawwavesin[i]) * (inverted ? -1.0 : 1.0);
00454         }
00455     }
00456     m_dsoWaveStartPos = pos;
00457 
00458     //background subtraction or dynamic noise reduction
00459     if(bg_after_last_echo)
00460         backgroundSub(m_dsoWave, pos, length, bgpos, bglength);
00461     for(int i = 1; i < numechoes; i++) {
00462         int rpos = pos + i * echoperiod;
00463         for(int j = 0;
00464         j < (!bg_after_last_echo ? std::max(bgpos + bglength, length) : length); j++) {
00465             int k = rpos + j;
00466             ASSERT(k < (int)_dso->lengthRecorded());
00467             if(i == 1)
00468                 m_dsoWave[pos + j] /= (double)numechoes;
00469             m_dsoWave[pos + j] += m_dsoWave[k] / (double)numechoes;
00470         }
00471     }
00472     //background subtraction or dynamic noise reduction
00473     if(!bg_after_last_echo)
00474         backgroundSub(m_dsoWave, pos, length, bgpos, bglength);
00475 
00476     if((emitter == _dso) || (!m_avcount)) { 
00477         for(int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00478             m_waveSum[i] += m_dsoWave[pos + i];
00479         }
00480         m_avcount++;
00481         if(*exAvgIncr()) {
00482             extraAvg()->value(m_avcount);
00483         }
00484     }
00485     double normalize = 1.0 / m_avcount;
00486     for(int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00487         m_wave[i] = m_waveSum[i] * normalize;
00488     }
00489     int ftpos = lrint(*fftPos() * 1e-3 / interval + _dso->trigPosRecorded() - pos);
00490 
00491     if(*difFreq() != 0.0) {
00492         //Digital IF.
00493         double omega = -2.0 * M_PI * *difFreq() * 1e3 * interval;
00494         for(int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00495             m_wave[i] *= std::polar(1.0, omega * (i - ftpos));
00496         }
00497     }
00498 
00499     //  if((windowfunc != &windowFuncRect) && (abs(ftpos - length/2) > length*0.1))
00500     //      m_statusPrinter->printWarning(KAME::i18n("FFTPos is off-centered for window func."));  
00501     double ph = *phaseAdv() * M_PI / 180;
00502     m_waveFTPos = ftpos;
00503     int fftlen = FFT::fitLength(*fftLen());
00504     //[Hz]
00505     m_dFreq = 1.0 / fftlen / interval;
00506     m_ftWave.resize(fftlen);
00507     rotNFFT(ftpos, ph, m_wave, m_ftWave);
00508     
00509     if(m_solverRecorded->peaks().size()) {
00510         entryPeakAbs()->value(m_solverRecorded->peaks()[0].first / (double)m_wave.size());
00511         double x = m_solverRecorded->peaks()[0].second;
00512         x = (x > fftlen / 2) ? (x - fftlen) : x;
00513         entryPeakFreq()->value(0.001 * x * m_dFreq);
00514     }
00515     
00516     if(picenabled && (m_avcount % 2 == 1) && (emitter == _dso)) {
00517         ASSERT( _pulser->time() );
00518         unlockConnection(_pulser);
00519         _pulser->invertPhase()->value(!inverted);
00520     }
00521     if(!*exAvgIncr() && (avgnum != m_avcount))
00522         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00523 }
00524 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::visualize() {
00525     if (!time() || !m_avcount) {
00526         ftWaveGraph()->clear();
00527         waveGraph()->clear();
00528         m_peakPlot->maxCount()->value(0);
00529         return;
00530     }
00531 
00532     int ftsize = m_ftWave.size();
00533     {
00534         XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*ftWaveGraph());
00535         ftWaveGraph()->setRowCount(ftsize);
00536         double normalize = 1.0 / m_wave.size();
00537         for (int i = 0; i < ftsize; i++) {
00538             int j = (i - ftsize/2 + ftsize) % ftsize;
00539             ftWaveGraph()->cols(0)[i] = 0.001 * (i - ftsize/2) * m_dFreq;
00540             std::complex<double> z = m_ftWave[j] * normalize;
00541             ftWaveGraph()->cols(1)[i] = std::real(z);
00542             ftWaveGraph()->cols(2)[i] = std::imag(z);
00543             ftWaveGraph()->cols(3)[i] = std::abs(z);
00544             ftWaveGraph()->cols(4)[i] = std::arg(z) / M_PI * 180;
00545         }
00546         m_peakPlot->maxCount()->value(m_solverRecorded->peaks().size());
00547         std::deque<XGraph::ValPoint> &points(m_peakPlot->points());
00548         points.resize(m_solverRecorded->peaks().size());
00549         for(int i = 0; i < m_solverRecorded->peaks().size(); i++) {
00550             double x = m_solverRecorded->peaks()[i].second;
00551             x = (x > ftsize / 2) ? (x - ftsize) : x;
00552             points[i] = XGraph::ValPoint(0.001 * x * m_dFreq,
00553                 m_solverRecorded->peaks()[i].first * normalize);
00554         }
00555     }
00556     {
00557         int length = m_dsoWave.size();
00558         XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*waveGraph());
00559         waveGraph()->setRowCount(length);
00560         for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00561             int j = i - m_dsoWaveStartPos;
00562             waveGraph()->cols(0)[i] = (startTime() + j * m_interval) * 1e3;
00563             if(abs(j) < ftsize / 2) {
00564                 j = (j - m_waveFTPos + ftsize) % ftsize;
00565                 waveGraph()->cols(1)[i] = std::real(m_solverRecorded->ifft()[j]);
00566                 waveGraph()->cols(2)[i] = std::imag(m_solverRecorded->ifft()[j]);
00567             }
00568             else {
00569                 waveGraph()->cols(1)[i] = 0.0;
00570                 waveGraph()->cols(2)[i] = 0.0;              
00571             }
00572             waveGraph()->cols(3)[i] = m_dsoWave[i].real();
00573             waveGraph()->cols(4)[i] = m_dsoWave[i].imag();              
00574         }
00575     }
00576 }
